4  # 100
5  # 101

4 << 1  # | | 1|0|0|0| 
4 >> 1  # | |  | |1|0|


x / 2
x >> 1

x = 4
y = 5

&
100  # 4
101  # 5
100  # 4

|
100  # 4
101  # 5
101  # 5

^
100  # 4
101  # 5
001  # 1

~100  # 4
  11  # 3
  
  
->192.168.134.0
->11000000.10101000.1000011 0.00000000
  11000000.10101000.1000011 1.00000001

->192.168.136.0
->11000000.10101000.10001 000.00000000
  11000000.10101000.10000 111.00000001

192.168.135.1
11000000.10101000.10000111.00000001
